Compare2 Kings 18:13, 2 Kings 20:19 , on which Isaiah is not dependent, and2 Chronicles 32:1-33 , which is not dependent on either (see App-56). This history is a proof of Isaiah"s prophetic mission and gifts. History and prophecy are thus combined: for the latter is history foretold, and the former is (in this and many cases) prophecy fulfilled: the two accounts being perfectly independent.
